person.name: Amal Makwana
person.headline: Senior Engineering Leader | Cloud-Native Architect | GenAI & Platform Transformation Strategist
person.summary: Amal Makwana is a UK-based Senior Technology Leader with nearly 20 years of experience delivering large-scale, mission-critical financial platforms across global markets. He combines deep hands-on engineering expertise with strategic programme leadership, cloud-native architecture, regulatory delivery, and GenAI-driven transformation. Amal has built and scaled multi-geography teams, modernised legacy platforms into event-driven microservices architectures, and led AI adoption initiatives (Copilot, LLMs, RAG, MCP) to enhance developer productivity and platform scalability.

professional_background.title: Senior Manager – Engineering & Delivery
responsibilities: Built and scaled cross-functional engineering teams (frontend, backend, business analysts) across NAM, EMEA, and APAC
Owned end-to-end application architecture including microservices, REST APIs, Kafka, MQ, and Oracle-based distributed systems
Established SDLC standards, CI/CD pipelines, production readiness frameworks, and engineering governance
Led adoption of GenAI tools (GitHub Copilot, Devin, LLMs, RAG, MCP) to improve developer productivity and delivery predictability
Managed vendors, budgets, performance governance, and stakeholder engagement at executive level
Ensured compliance with internal audit, regulatory, and risk frameworks
impact: Delivered custody modernisation programme transforming legacy systems into fault-tolerant, event-driven architecture
Launched Custody Data Manager platform improving operational efficiency and data availability
Established platform, team, and delivery governance in record time
